name: Crema de calabac√≠n
instructions: - Dice the onion and cook it until brown with the oil.
- Meanwhile chop the leek and garlic, add it when the onion is ready.
- Dice in larger chunks the zucchini (do NOT peel them. It gives it a nice green color), potato and throw them in with some salt and black pepper.
- After some minutes, add the water and boil for 20'
- When it's done, remove from the heat and blend. Correct for thickness (add water), and then for salt.

serving: Usually served along some grated cheese or bread
